Tabletop\nPlaying anywhere, with anyone, any way.
Hello here link italic http://google.com http://foo.bar
Type new directory name in field at the bottom of screen
No files selected. Choose file from list or type file name in a field.
With this option you will let remote player to join current game. In this version it is not yet implemented. Check http://code.google.com/p/android-tabletop/ for latest version.
This application is licensed under GPL v3. You can download sources and see details on http://code.google.com/p/android-tabletop/
